description: Free or 'Open Source' software, and in particular Linux, is doing extremely well technically. However, it fails to secure a significant portion of the protected, lucrative software market, especially for end-users. The main obstacles to overcoming the domination of propriatery software, most of them non-technical, require thinking outside of code-writing.

videos.title: Overtaking Propriatery Software Whithout Writing Code
